author: dmitrijus
body:
Now it is instantiated once(!), by EgHLTOfflineSource.
Everyone who uses it gets a read-only reference.

Made EgHLTMonElemFuncs to be a proper class,
to help passing parameters around.

Please test/review before accepting.

(Followup of #7360)
title: Make EgHLTTrigCodes non-static.
